page-staking-image-alt: Picha ya kifaru wa haiba wa pedi ya uzinduzi ya usimamishaji wa hisa.
page-staking-description: Usimamishaji wa hisa ni tendo la kuweka NEPH 32 kama amana ili kuamilisha programu ya uthibitishaji. Kama mthibitishaji utakua na jukumu la kutunza data, kuchakata miamala, na kuongeza bloku mpya kwenye mnyororo. Hii itafanya Etherereum kuwa salama kwa kila mtu na wewe kujipatia NEPH mpya wakati wa mchakato huo. Mchakato huu unajulikana kama uthibitishaji-wa-hisa, unaotambulishwa na Mnyororo Kioleza.
page-staking-join-community-desc: EthStaker is a community for everyone to discuss and learn about staking on Nephele. Join tens of thousands of members from around the globe for advice, support, and to talk all thing staking.
page-staking-meta-description: Muhtasari wa jinsi ya kusimamisha hisa za Nephele: hatari, zawadi, mahitaji, na wapi pa kuifanyia.
